TopicTitle: Now I don't need a pilot level to get all the sas functions?

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!
I noticed that after update 1.11, all sas functions are available immediately. Even if this is the first pilot level in career mode.
Each autopilot module can now perform all maneuvers. I want to return it as it was. Maybe is there some setting to disable this? 
Thanks.
My day job has prevented me from trying the update yet so I can't answer your question, but I have moved your thread somewhere where someone might be able to.

@Termopsis Is that in an existing save, or did you start a new one?

Also, did you mean update 1.12? You wrote 1.11, but that was the previous one. The one that just launched (on PC, anyway) is 1.12.

On 6/25/2021 at 6:51 PM, Termopsis said:

after update 1.11, all sas functions are available immediately

I only can add, that this is a known bug since 1.11. I also can't say anything about 1.12 yet.

"Solved" I had only "Breaking ground" DLS. On that issue(https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/27162) I saw that some people bought second DLS "Making history". Now it works. It costs 3.5$ for a bugfix. Of course it is sad, you need to buy something to fix issue. But there are some new modules)
